SELECT member_id memberId, name, email, nickname, postcode, phone FROM Member WHERE member_id != 'admin' ORDER BY create_date DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE Member SET member_id = #{memberId}, name = #{name}, email = #{email}, nickname = #{nickname}, postcode = #{postcode}, phone = #{phone} WHERE member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.select: SELECT d.donation_id donationId, d.title, m.nickname, d.inserted, d.expired, d.enable, d.goal, d.current_amount currentAmount, d.topic, bi.main_image_name MPhoto, bi.image_folder_id folderName FROM Donation d LEFT JOIN Member m ON d.member_id = m.member_id LEFT JOIN BoardImage bi ON d.donation_id = bi.donation_id WHERE bi.main_image_name IS NOT NULL GROUP BY d.donation_id ORDER BY enable ASC, expired ASC

SELECT d.donation_id donationId, d.title, d.content, m.nickname, d.inserted, d.expired, d.goal, d.current_amount currentAmount, d.enable, bi.main_image_name MPhoto, bi.image_folder_id folderName FROM Donation d LEFT JOIN Member m ON d.member_id = m.member_id LEFT JOIN BoardImage bi ON d.donation_id = bi.donation_id WHERE d.donation_id = #{donationId} AND bi.main_image_name IS NOT NULL
SELECT main_image_name MPhoto, image_folder_id folderName FROM BoardImage WHERE donation_id = #{donationId} AND main_image_name IS NOT NULL
SELECT image_url FROM BoardImage WHERE donation_id = #{donationId} AND image_url IS NOT NULL

SELECT t.talent_id talentId, t.title, m.nickname, t.enable enable, bi.main_image_name MPhoto, bi.image_folder_id folderName FROM Talent t LEFT JOIN Member m ON t.member_id = m.member_id LEFT JOIN BoardImage bi ON t.talent_id = bi.talent_id WHERE bi.main_image_name IS NOT NULL GROUP BY talentId ORDER BY enable ASC, talentId DESC

SELECT t.talent_id talentId, t.title, t.content, t.price, t.topic, t.map_level mapLevel, t.address, t.product_name productName, t.work_date workDate, t.number_people numberOfPeople, t.self_introduction selfIntroduction, t.class_content classContent, m.nickname, bi.main_image_name MPhoto, bi.image_folder_id folderName FROM Talent t LEFT JOIN Member m ON t.member_id = m.member_id LEFT JOIN BoardImage bi ON t.talent_id = bi.talent_id WHERE t.talent_id = #{talentId} AND bi.main_image_name IS NOT NULL
SELECT main_image_name MPhoto, image_folder_id folderName FROM BoardImage WHERE talent_id = #{talentId} AND main_image_name IS NOT NULL
SELECT image_url FROM BoardImage WHERE talent_id = #{talentId} AND image_url IS NOT NULL

SELECT m.meeting_id meetingId, m.title, mem.nickname, m.start_date startDate, m.end_date endDate, bi.main_image_name MPhoto, bi.image_folder_id folderName FROM Meeting m LEFT JOIN Member mem ON m.member_id = mem.member_id LEFT JOIN BoardImage bi ON m.meeting_id = bi.meeting_id WHERE bi.main_image_name IS NOT NULL GROUP BY meetingId ORDER BY meetingId DESC

SELECT mt.meeting_id meetingId, mt.member_id memberId, mt.title, mt.content, mt.postcode, mt.address, mt.detailAddress, mt.inserted, mt.start_date startDate, mt.end_date endDate, mt.tag, m.nickname, bi.main_image_name MPhoto, bi.image_folder_id folderName FROM Meeting mt LEFT JOIN Member m ON mt.member_id = m.member_id LEFT JOIN BoardImage bi ON mt.meeting_id = bi.meeting_id WHERE mt.meeting_id = #{meetingId} AND bi.main_image_name IS NOT NULL
SELECT main_image_name MPhoto, image_folder_id folderName FROM BoardImage WHERE meeting_id = #{meetingId} AND main_image_name IS NOT NULL
SELECT image_url FROM BoardImage WHERE meeting_id = #{meetingId} AND image_url IS NOT NULL

SELECT m.market_id marketId, m.member_id memberId, m.title, m.product_name productName, m.price, f.file thumbNailImage, COUNT(f.market_id) hasFile FROM Market m LEFT JOIN MarketFile f ON m.market_id = f.market_id GROUP BY m.market_id ORDER BY m.market_id DESC
SELECT market_id marketId, member_id memberId, title, content, inserted, price, product_name productName, enable FROM Market WHERE market_id = #{marketId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Market (member_id, title, content, price, product_name, product_code) VALUES(#{memberId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{price}, #{productName}, #{productCode})
mapper.select: SELECT f.question_id questionId, f.member_id memberId, f.title, f.content, f.inserted, f.email, f.enable, ff.file thumbNailImage FROM Faq f LEFT JOIN FaqFile ff ON f.question_id = ff.question_id GROUP BY questionId ORDER BY enable ASC, questionId DESC
SELECT question_id questionId, member_id memberId, title, content, inserted, email, enable FROM Faq WHERE question_id = #{questionId}
